name: Juno's not so Jaunty Journey
description:
Juno's not so Jaunty Journey is a 2.5D Jump'n'Run Platformer Game. 

Help Juno, who is stuck for unknown reasons inside a digital arcade retro world, to overcome many challenges and obstacles by using a strange gadgets that helps her overcome her human limits. 

Use the gadget to jump galantly through the air and solve many levels.

This version of the game includes a small preview with 5 different levels. The game is also currently on hold, but there are plans to keep working on it.

This game was made by me during my Master Thesis. If you're interested in more of my works, you can visit my website (Coming soon).

Game Design, Level Design, Sound, Programming and 3D was completely made by me.

2D art was done by RockAngelArt.

Thank you for visiting this page and giving feedback, if you did so.
